The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in West Sussex so far as at 13 August is 61,371 (7,073.4 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 08 August, there were 2,569 new confirmed cases (296.1 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 August, there were 2,211 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 16% (358 extra cases).
